content: 2 years ago and it has been a great learning experience for me i have learnt so many stitches and techniques and i am always amazed by how much it has to offer i am learning something new every day this blanket cal is my attempt to build a blanket with some simple tunisian stitches the aim is for people of any skill level to join and hopefully learn something new and have a finished product to showcase at the end **facebook group** if you would like to officially join the cal join my knitterknotter hangout group on facebook 3 **about the cal** this will be a beginner friendly tunisian crochet blanket the focus will be on learning and we will take it slow - we will learn 1 new stitch every week and make a 8 x 8 square at the end of 16 weeks we will put together all our squares and make a blanket the cal starts on may 14th and is sponsored by clover and lion brand yarn there will be prizes too head over to my blog for more details about the pattern prizes and the schedule **cal schedule** you can find all the weekly updates for this cal here https //knitterknotter com/tunisian-sampler-blanket-cal-weekly-updates/ week 0 may 7 may 13 gather your supplies 4 week 1 may 14 may 20 tunisian simple stitch 5 week 2 may 21 may 27 tunisian full stitch 6 week 3 may 28 jun 3 tunisian purl stitch 7 week 4 jun 4 jun 10 tunisian knit stitch 8 week 5 jun 11 jun 17 tunisian reverse stitch 9 week 6 jun 18 jun 24 tunisian honeycomb stitch 10 week 7 jun 25 ju1 1 tunisian rib stitch 11 week 8 jul 2 jul 8 tunisian top stitch 12 week 9 jul 9 jul 15 tunisian x stitch 13 week 10 jul 16 jul 22 mori lace pattern 14 week 11 jul 23 jul 29 tunisian double_crochet stitch 15 week 12 jul 30 aug 5 tunisian yarn over stitch 16 week 13 aug 6 aug 12 tunisian cables 17 week 14 aug 13 - aug 19 tunisian bobbles 18 week 15 aug 20 - aug 26 tunisian extended stitches 19 week 16 aug 27 - sep 2 tunisian moss stitch 20 week 17 sep 3 - sep 9 joining and border 21 extended week 1 sep 24 sep 30 c2c entrelac 22 extended week 2 oct 1 oct 7 change color 23 extended week 3 oct 8 oct 14 mitered square 24 extended week 4 oct 15 oct 21 log cabin square 25 extended week 5 oct 22 oct 28 tunisian in the round titr 26 extended week 6 oct 29 nov 4 pinwheel square 27 extended week 7 nov 5 nov 11 tunisian textured waves 28 extended week 8 nov 12 nov 18 asparagus stitch by andrea crețu 29 extended week 9 nov 19 nov 25 cross stitch on tunisian crochet 30 extended week 10 nov 26 - decrease 2
